original_title: Browns Group Clinches Victory in B Division at 3rd Mercantile Hockey 9-A-Side Tournament
original_body_lines: The Browns Group Hockey Team triumphed at the B Division of the 3rd Mercantile Hockey 9-A-Side Tournament, held at the Air Force Hockey Grounds, Ekala recently.

In a fiercely contested final, the Browns Group Hockey Team demonstrated exceptional skill and determination, securing victory with a final score of 1-0 against Hayleys Group. The decisive goal was brilliantly executed by Pathum Probodha, showcasing the team’s prowess on the hockey field.

The entire Browns Group Hockey Team exhibited outstanding sportsmanship throughout the tournament, showcasing their commitment to the values of competition, camaraderie and athletic achievement. The victory in the B Division adds another accolade to the Browns Group’s rich sporting history and reinforces its status as a force to be reckoned with in the corporate sports arena. This significant achievement underscores the Group’s excellence in sports and its dedication to fostering a culture of teamwork.
